src_text: this shows that children need skills and resources to help them use the internet safely.
tgt_text: hona ho bontsha hore bana ba hloka tsebo le mehlodi ya ho ba thusa ho sebedisa inthanete ka mokgwa o bolokelehileng.

src_text: mmaletjema poto, the fpb’s child protection officer, said parents need to be aware of the dangers their children face online, in cluding viewing child pornography or child sexual abuse, and being groomed by sexual predators.
tgt_text: mmaletjema poto, moofisiri wa tshireletso ya bana wa fpb, o itse batswadi ba hloka ho ela hloko kotsi eo bana ba bona ba tobanang le yona inthaneteng, ho kenyeletsa ho shebella difilimi tse bontshang thobalano ya bana kapa tlhekefetso ya motabo ya bana, le ho tjhoriswa ke dilalome tsa tlhekefetso ka motabo.

src_text: children can become the target of online sexual predators by just conducting an innocent internet search and clicking on the wrong link.
tgt_text: bana e kaba diphofu tsa dilalome tsa tlhekefetso ka motabo tsa inthane teng ha ba batla ho itseng feela inthaneteng le ho tobetsa lehokanyi le fosahetseng.

src_text: offenders then gain their trust and start grooming them.
tgt_text: ebe batlodi ba molao ba hapa tshepo ya bona mme ba qale ho ba tjhorisa.

src_text: "the child is often embarrassed and therefore doesn’t speak about it, which makes it hard for them to get out of the grooming cycle," said poto.
tgt_text: "hangata ngwana o ba le dihlong mme kahoo o tshaba ho bua ka sena, e leng se etsang hore ho be boima ho ba ntsha ho tebetebeng ena ya ho tjhorisetswa diketso tsa thobalano ya bana," ho rialo poto.

src_text: she also warned against sharing videos or images of child pornography online.
tgt_text: o boetse a hlokomedisa kgahlano le ho fetisetsana dividio kapa ditshwantsho tsa thobalano ya bana inthaneteng.

src_text: "it has become a norm to share content on social media.
tgt_text: "e se e le tlwaelo jwale ho fetisetsana dintho marangrang.

src_text: but sharing this type of content is evidence of child abuse.
tgt_text: empa, ho fetisetsana dintho tsa mefuta o tjena ke bopaki ba tlhekefetso ya bana.

src_text: being in possession of such content or sharing it is a criminal offence," added poto.
tgt_text: ho fumanwa o ena le dintho tsena kapa ho di fetisetsana ke tlolo ya molao," ho rialo poto.

src_text: help at hand there are various resources available to help children use the internet safely.
tgt_text: thuso e ya fumaneha ho na le mehlodi e mengata e fumanehang ho thusa bana ho sebedisa inthanete ka mokgwa o bolokehileng.

src_text: the mma runs web rangers, a digital literacy programme to upskill learners, teachers and parents.
tgt_text: mma e laola web rangers, lenaneo la ho ithuta ka tsa dijithale ho ntlafatsa tsebo ya baithuti, matitjhere le batswadi.

src_text: educational videos about cyberbullying, sexting and online grooming, are available at www.
tgt_text: dividio tse hlokomedisang batho ka tlhekefetso ya inthane teng, ho romellana melaetsa ya thobalano ka selefouno le ho tjhorisa bakeng sa thobalano inthaneteng, di fumaneha ho www.

src_text: webrangers.co.za the mma also helps children through its hashplay (https://hashplay.co.za) website, which includes a social media platform that allows children to talk to an online consultant about what they are experiencing on social media.
tgt_text: webrangers.co.za.

tgt_text: mma e boela e thusa bana ka websaete ya yona ya hashplay (https://hashplay.co.za), eo e kenyeletsang mokato wa marangrang a dumella ng bana ho buisana le moeletsi wa inthaneteng ka tseo ba kopanang le tsona ho marangrang.

tgt_text: digify africa e na le kitso whatsapp bot (platefomo ya dipuisano) ya mahala e thusang bana ho ntshetsa pele tsebo ya ho ithuta ka tsa dijithale.

src_text: com/learnersresponsiblecitizens.
